text: @Mike_Pence @VP @POTUS "Dr. Anthony Fauci, a leading infectious disease expert on the White House’s coronavirus task force, said the frequency of his meetings with President Donald Trump has been “dramatically decreased". Appears Dr. Fauci's comments spurred this meeting, so where is Dr. Fauci?
